name: ai-agentic-browser
description: AI-powered browser with real Chromium browsing capabilities

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && python server.py" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python server.py" "cd frontend && npm start" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && echo 'Backend ready for production'
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && python -m pytest
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cd backend && python server.py" "cd frontend && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron-pack: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && electron-builder
scripts.dist: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && electron-builder --publish=never
